author: mrcrypto2000
content:
Hi everyone, I am currently assisting in the development of a project that is focused on creating a user-friendly language for expressing intents in decentralized finance with a particular emphasis on intent-centric DeFi.

I am looking for a someone with background as a protocol engineer from Uniswap labs or Ethereum core developer. Ideally, have experience in core research related to scaling (sharding), a deep understanding of statelessness, extensive knowledge of MEV.

DM me if you'd like some more info ðŸ™‚
